column3: Test that the user can add a product to the shopping cart.
column4: User is logged in and browsing a product.
column5:
1. Go to product page.
2. Select quantity/size.

column3: Ensure that the checkout process works correctly.
column6: Product is added to the cart and cart details are updated.

column3: Verify that a user can log in successfully
column5:
1. Go to login page.
2. Enter username and password.
3. Click "Login"
column6: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the homepage.

column3: Ensure that the website is responsive on mobile devices.
column4: The website is accessible on a mobile device.
column5:
1. Open the website on a mobile browser.
2. Navigate through various pages.
column6: Website adapts to mobile screen, buttons and links are clickable..

column3: Ensure that the user can log out successfully
column5:
1. Click the "Logout" button.
2. Verify user is logged out and redirected to the homepage.
column6: User is logged out and redirected to the homepage
